props.name: variant
props.description: Changes the visual representation of the button.

props.name: intent
props.description: Changes the intent of the button. Mostly changes the color profile.

props.name: inverted
props.description: Changes the color presentation for different backgrounds.

props.name: large
props.description: Changes the size of the button to large.

props.name: fluid
props.description: Makes the button scale to full width of its parent element.

props.name: loading
props.description: Sets the button into a loading state displaying <Loader /> as content.

props.name: is
props.description: Changes the underlying element of the button.

props.name: className
props.description: Adds custom classes to the element.
